snippet: Jonathan Mahler's story on Benton Harbor, M.I., prompted responses from all over the world.
abstract: Jonathan Mahler's story on Benton Harbor, M.I., prompted responses from all over the world.
lead_paragraph: Jonathan Mahler's article on Benton Harbor, Mich., prompted responses from all over the world. Not surprisingly, a disproportionate number of respondents hailed from Michigan.
